io.micronaut.core.beans

Interface BeanWrapper<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The bean type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationSource

    public interface BeanWrapper<T>
extends AnnotationMetadataProvider
    Wraps a bean allowing to read and write its properties via a underlying BeanIntrospection.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.micronaut.core.annotation.AnnotationSource
